title: I downloaded lol on my D: drive and I can't move it to my usb
body: I installed lol on a D: drive because I was running out of space and now im trying to move it onto a USB 3.0 but when I copy it on to the USB and try to play on it it will say your files are corrupt. (I think it's because if you install it on a D: drive it doesn't come in a riot games folder)

replies.body: League is best installed in your primary internal drive.  It won't respond well with an external or thumb drive, doing so will cause the patcher to re-download files every time your restart it.
